meanings.definition: Moving or capable of moving with great speed
meanings.sent1: The cheetah is the swiftest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The hare is known for being one of the swiftest creatures in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The swiftest squirrel in the park always beats the others to the acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her swiftest reflexes saved her from tripping over the rock.
meanings.sent5: The swiftest river flowed through the valley, carrying everything in its path.

meanings.sent1: The swiftest delivery service in town always gets packages to customers on time.
meanings.sent2: She gave the swiftest response to the question, impressing everyone with her knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The swiftest chef in the kitchen finished preparing the meal in record time.
meanings.sent4: His swiftest decision-making skills helped him succeed in the fast-paced environment.
meanings.sent5: The swiftest student in the class completed the assignment before anyone else.
